discussion_comments.comment_body:
I had a couple small grammatical suggestions, and I also don't think we should link to an HTTP-only personal site. Thoughts? 
```suggestion
Thanks to Cameron Taggart for the initial implementation and the .NET foundation for ongoing support of [SourceLink](https://github.com/dotnet/sourcelink) which we use to provide source debugging.
```

Another option might be to link to his GitHub page as the current Source Link [repo does](https://github.com/dotnet/sourcelink/blob/main/README.md?plain=1#L9).
